channel.title: Can some one help me with castlewars
channel.description: can some one help me code a 100% working castle wars or can give me a code or some thing please :) i have been trying for like 2 days... sad i know

item.title: Can some one help me with castlewars
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:11, topic:269635”]declare this

public int castleWars = false;

then add this command

if (command.startsWith("castlewars") && castleWars == false) { castleWars = true; sM("you turn on castle wars! GOOD JOB!"); }

there u go, 100% castle wars[/quote]

Lol, fail code x]

Read full topic
item.source: Can some one help me with castlewars

item.title: Can some one help me with castlewars
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

declare this

public int castleWars = false;

then add this command

if (command.startsWith("castlewars") && castleWars == false) { castleWars = true; sM("you turn on castle wars! GOOD JOB!"); }

there u go, 100% castle wars
